name: Ragnarok Online - Free to Play - European Version
description: The first time you start the game, you are going to have to open the game several times until all the updates are complete. This is the normal behaviour of the game.
notes: To create a new account to play Ragnarok Online click here.
content:
game:
  appid: 250740
  arch: win32
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    arch: win32
- task:
    app: vcrun2008
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    arch: win32
- task:
    app: ie8
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    arch: win32
- task:
    name: set_regedit
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D
    key: DirectDrawRenderer
    value: 'opengl'
    type: REG_SZ
    arch: win32
